cause.description:
Joshua Staley has been involved with worship ministries for several years now he plays cheap guitars which he still makes sound decent! He really needs a Taylor Guitar to be the ultimate worship leader! Please give anything you can!
1. Joshua Needs A Taylor
2. Josh Needs A job
3. Josh needs A taylor!!
cause.mission: Provide enough funds to allow Josh Staley to buy a Taylor guitar
cause.name: Help Josh get a Taylor
